column4: i just installed ubuntu-gnome desktop  via apt but i am not able to login :-( ....on kubuntu
after logging into gnome nothing comes up ....i have kill X
i am using kdm
is possible 2 use both kde and gnome on ubuntu ?
i just installed ubuntu-gnome desktop  via apt but i am not able to login :-( ....on kubuntu
after logging into gnome nothing comes up ....i have 2 kill X gnome each time as nothing comes up
i just installed ubuntu-gnome desktop  via apt but i am not able to login :-( ....on kubuntu
after logging into gnome nothing comes up ....i have 2 kill X gnome each time as nothing comes up
can you login on the text console?
are you short of diskspace? (df)
look at your $HOME/.xsession-errors to see if there is a clue
have you looked at .xsession-errors like I asked you to?
nothing all kde related errors
that is not the way to trace the error you're seeing.
restart gdm, run a tail on .xsession-errors in the text console, then switch to gdm and login. When it hangs, look at the tail of .xsession-errors.
I am using kdm not gdm
but you're trying to start Gnome? Same procedure then.
shoudi remove My esiting x sessio errors file then
no, unnecessary. In the text console, run 'tail -f $HOME/.xsession-errors'
I will be back ;-)
good luck.
you can install xubuntu. The boot screen is nice and blue after that...
no thanks i like gnome
wasn't there once a Linux distro for girls? With a fortune db displaying beauty tips on login?
